subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kristi Toliver tied her career high with 29 points, going 12 of 17 from the floor, and the Los Angeles Sparks led all the way in defeating the Liberty to improve to 7-0 at home.
snippet: Kristi Toliver tied her career high with 29 points, going 12 of 17 from the floor, and the Los Angeles Sparks led all the way in defeating the Liberty to improve to 7-0 at home.
